cab.content: (This Docwrmgnl: the jropgsrty of^ His Britannic SV1aje$ty's Government) * 89i^MNS^ary Secret. 107a '*_________,\v-"v.:/'' from Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,.HM:^X 3rd September 1919.(Repeated under B 4135 &?/ Commander-in-Ghief to Constantinople, cairo and Baghdad)(Received 6th.)12109.. 3rd September. Malleson wires 1st September, repeated Teheran : "I have secured copy of Barkatulla's pamphlet in which he seeks (? affidavit) for Bolshevic doctrines (? with) teachings of Koran. Capt. Samad (? Shah) says that it is very cleverly done and may have desired effect with all but the learned. It is now (corrupt group) freely circulated throughout Central Asia and in Persia and Afghanistan. Mine is in Persian but agents report copies in Indian have been (corrupt group) to Afghanistan for India."
